bioAsHtml: Karen has 14 years of extensive experience in community development and the design & implementation of large marketing campaigns (incl. conferences and mass events). She headed the marketing team at iMinds (formerly IBBT) for 8 years, putting the software innovation institute on the European map and on the radar of many innovation actors across the world. Karen and her team have been in charge of hundreds of workshops and events involving many different stakeholder groups, actively seeking cross-fertilization and knowledge exchange. With that goal in mind she also founded and is now managing the non-profit organization Startups.be, allowing the Belgian tech startup ecosystem to gather, organize, grow impact and provide an international leverage effect for the tech entrepreneurs. Karen has grown the Startups.be network into the most comprehensive organization at national level representing the Belgian startup ecosystem, including 75+ incubators, accelerators, investors, communities & public agencies.

acceptedTalks.title: From Startup Manifesto to Startup Nation

bio:
Karen has 14 years of extensive experience in community development and the design & implementation of large marketing campaigns (incl. conferences and mass events). She headed the marketing team at iMinds (formerly IBBT) for 8 years, putting the software innovation institute on the European map and on the radar of many innovation actors across the world. Karen and her team have been in charge of hundreds of workshops and events involving many different stakeholder groups, actively seeking cross-fertilization and knowledge exchange. With that goal in mind she also founded and is now managing the non-profit organization Startups.be, allowing the Belgian tech startup ecosystem to gather, organize, grow impact and provide an international leverage effect for the tech entrepreneurs. 
Karen has grown the Startups.be network into the most comprehensive organization at national level representing the Belgian startup ecosystem, including 75+ incubators, accelerators, investors, communities & public agencies.
